JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Surface-finisher jobs available now in Denmark
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Type of employment: permanent
Location: Denmark
Starting date: as soon as possible

Job description
Surface finishers needed throughout Denmark. Interested candidates are encouraged to apply by sending their application or calling +45 88448244 during our office hours: Monday-Thursday 9:00-15:00 and Friday 9:00-13:00.

Job duties and responsibilities

  • Sanding, pressure washing, and cleaning surfaces.

  • Applying various types of coatings.

  • Painting surfaces to achieve a professional finish.

Job requirements

  • Minimum 2-3 years of documented experience in a similar role.

  • Thorough understanding of safety procedures related to oil tanks, storage facilities, and refineries.

  • Knowledge of Ultra High Pressure (UHP) cleaning up to 3,000b.

  • Knowledge of sandblasting to SA 2.5 standards.

  • Experience with pre-treatment of rust, weld seams, and other impurities on steel and metal surfaces using tools like wire brushes and flap discs.

  • Knowledge of applying multi-layer paint systems (primer, intermediate coat, topcoat) to steel and metal surfaces, achieving specific layer thicknesses (e.g., 260µ).

  • Experience working with lifts and scaffolding.

  • English skills: medium level required

Qualifications

  • Driver's license not required, but it can be an advantage

Salary and benefits

  • Hourly gross salary: 175,00 kr./hour + 15,20% other bonuses (SH, fritvalg).

  • Monthly net salary (after Danish taxes): ~21,000 kr. (€ 2,800.00).

  • 5 weeks per year - paid holiday (12,5% of the annual salary).

  • Accommodation and transportation to work: provided if needed.

  • Eurojob Denmark may provide assistance for registration to SIRI, SKAT, BorgerService, and all the other authorities, free of charge.

Working hours requirements

  • 7:00 to 15:00 (with a 1-hour break), 5 days a week, Saturdays and Sundays free.
